description.text: How does use-to-earn reward you if buy TiTi from uniswap?
In principle, the more TiTi you buy from uniswap, the more rewards you will earn.

The use-to-earn module will listen to your interaction with TiUSD-TiTi trading pairs on uniswap and calculate your total transaction volume buying TiTi. Subsequently, the protocol will calculate how many rewards you'll earn according to your proportion against all users' transaction volume buying TiTi in the past 24 hrs. Moreover, the protocol will restart the rewards distribution calculation every 24 hrs. Remember, TiTi Use-to-earn farming rewards will be distributed to users in a 7-DAY-Cycle consecutively. Meanwhile, you are able to claim use-to-earn rewards of  the last Cycle (7 days) anytime after the Cycle finishes. The  unclaimed TiTi Rewards for past Cycles will be automatically accumulated to your address.
Keep in mind that you can claim the rewards in Epoch-1 starting from UTC 08:00 a.m. Mar 23th.
